sentences.sContent: A hominid is really any extinct ape more closely related to us than the chimpanzee.
sentences.sContent_eng: A hominid is really any extinct ape more closely related to us than the chimpanzee.
sentences.sCn: 原始人类中任何一个灭绝的猿物种和我们的关系都比黑猩猩更密切。

sentences.sContent: From one perspective, the development of a very small penis could be considered the next step in male hominid evolution.
sentences.sContent_eng: From one perspective, the development of a very small penis could be considered the next step in male hominid evolution.
sentences.sCn: 从这一角度看，在原始男性进化中，非常小阴茎的男人在下一步可能优先考虑发展。

sentences.sContent: H. erectus is generally believed to be the direct ancestor of modern humans and also the first hominid to live in caves and tame fire.
sentences.sContent_eng: H. erectus is generally believed to be the direct ancestor of modern humans and also the first hominid to live in caves and tame fire.
sentences.sCn: 人们通常认为直立人是现代人的直接祖先，也是第一个生活在洞穴中和学会用火的原始人类。

remMethod.val: homi(=hom人) + nid → 原始人类； 人科动物

words.tran: 回家的；自动导引的；有返回性的

trans.tranOther: any primate of the family Hominidae, which includes modern man (Homo sapiens) and the extinct precursors of man
